channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 6th November
item.description:
The fridge freezer has been blocking the public pavement for almost 1 months now. My husband recently moved it to the side so that children can use the pavement and not walk on the street. The fridge belongs to number 57 Harlinger Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harlinger Street, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: Ranwell Passage Covered In Litter, 6th November
item.description:
Ranwell Passage has not been swept for a few weeks, probably not since the last time I request for it to be cleaned. Please can it be added to the Herbert Road street cleaner's rota, seeing as most of the litter is from that road. I have been litter picking the bottom half of the steps, but it is not my job to keep Ranwell Passage clean!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36-38, Herbert Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sandy lane, 6th November
item.description:
This was part of the horrendous months during the summer where cray avenue - Sevenoaks way main road and finally sandy Lane were dug up to replace some or other utility pipes - Sandy Lane was then accessible for traffic from Ruxley roundabout - but now they're back and have blocked the entire road again - WHY ? Didn't they do the job properly the first time ?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandy Lane, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
